briefdescription.para: Callback to request a modem state change, being it powering off, flight mode etc.

simplesect.para: positive value to indicate seconds before retry
negative error code in case of a failure

detaileddescription.para:
event
LwM2M Firmware Update object event structure
Callback is used for indicating firmware update states and to prepare application ready for update.
Event handler is getting event callback when Firmware update utils library change states.
LWM2M_FOTA_DOWNLOAD_START: Indicate that download or upload of a new image is started.
LWM2M_FOTA_DOWNLOAD_FINISHED: Indicate that Image is delivered.

LWM2M_FOTA_UPDATE_IMAGE_REQ: Request a permission to update an image. Callback handler may return zero to grant permission for update. Otherwise it may return negative error code to cancel the update or positive value to indicate that update should be postponed that amount of seconds.
LWM2M_FOTA_UPDATE_ERROR: Indicate that FOTA process have failed or cancelled.

simplesect.para: zero indicating OK or negative error code indicating an failure and will mark the whole FOTA process to failed. Positive return code will postpone the request, but can only be used in LWM2M_FOTA_UPDATE_IMAGE_REQ event.

briefdescription.para: Initialize Security object support for nrf91.

detaileddescription.para: This wrapper will install hooks that allows device to do a proper bootstrap and store received server settings to permanent storage using Zephyr settings API. Credential are stored to modem and no keys would enter the flash.

simplesect.para: This API calls settings_subsys_init() and should only be called after the settings backend (Flash or FS) is ready.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t sec_obj_inst, const void *psk, int psk_len, bool psk_is_hex, const char *psk_id)
memberdef.name: lwm2m_security_set_psk

briefdescription.para: Set security object to PSK mode.

detaileddescription.para: Any pointer can be given as a NULL, which means that data related to this field is set to zero length in the engine. Effectively, it causes that relative data is not written into the modem. This can be used if the given data is already provisioned to the modem.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to PSK key, either in HEX or binary format.
Length of data in PSK pointer. If PSK is HEX string, should include string terminator.
True if PSK points to data in HEX format. False if the data is binary.
PSK key ID in string format.

simplesect.para: Zero if success, negative error code otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t sec_obj_inst, const void *cert, int cert_len, const void *private_key, int key_len, const void *ca_chain, int ca_len)
memberdef.name: lwm2m_security_set_certificate

briefdescription.para: Set security object to certificate mode.

detaileddescription.para: Any pointer can be given as a NULL, which means that data related to this field is set to zero length in the engine. Effectively, it causes that relative data is not written into the modem. This can be used if the given data is already provisioned to the modem.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to CA certificate or server certificate.

simplesect.para: Zero if success, negative error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the client credentials are already stored.

simplesect.para: false If client credentials are already available.
